I can reproduce the NPE in the source locator simply by selecting a stack frame 
with an obsolete method (due to a failed HCR). However, that does not look the 
problem you having with source highlighting.

Fixed NPE in JavaSourceLocator. The source update problem could be related to 
bug 30971. Please close/re-open the debug perspective to see if this helps.

NOTE: I just saw the highlighting problem too - closing/opening the debug view 
fixed this problem, so I am confident this is dup of bug 30971 (which will be 
in the next integration build).
